alert.note: Alert for Northern Blaine County; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 13 at 3:03AM MDT until April 14 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulation up to 4 inches at elevations above 3000 feet. Snow accumulations of one inch or less in the Milk River Valley where precipitation may be mixed with rain at times. * WHERE...Northern Blaine County and Western and Central Chouteau County. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, may be slick and hazardous, especially this morning and again this evening after sunset.
info.instruction: To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Northern Blaine County; Western and Central Chouteau County
